co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api

Class MceApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application
          • co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.MceApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks, co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.SdkTags

    public class MceApplication
extends android.app.Application
implements SdkInitLifecycleCallbacks, co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.SdkTags
    This class should be extended by applications that use the MCE sdk.

        public static java.lang.Class getCurrentForegroundActivity()

        Returns:

        public void onCreate()
        This method initializes the SDK. If you extend this class and override this method, make sure you call super.omCreate() or the SDK initialization will fail to start.
